item.title: Workers across France strike over budget cut plans
item.description: The widespread walkouts come less than a fortnight after the government collapsed over a proposed budget.

item.title: Royals, Maga and tech CEOs: What we learned from state banquet guest list
item.description: The event is as much about diplomacy as it is about fine dining.

item.title: Egypt says 3,000-year-old bracelet was stolen and melted down
item.description: A specialist took the gold artefact from a Cairo museum and sold it through a jeweller, officials say.

item.title: Malawi's parties warned not to prematurely declare election victory
item.description: The parties of both President Lazarus Chakwera and his main rival, Peter Mutharika, say they won Tuesday's poll.

item.title: 'Cataclysmic' situation in Gaza City, UN official says, as Israeli tanks advance
item.description: A constant of stream of Palestinians flee southwards as Israeli tanks reportedly push further into Gaza's biggest urban centre.
